recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Slice eggplant and season with salt.
Coat slices in flour, egg, and breadcrumbs.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until golden brown.
Top with marinara sauce and cheese.
Bake for an additional 10 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.title: Mango Salsa
directions: Dice mango, red bell pepper, onion, and cilantro.
Combine in a bowl with lime juice and salt.
Stir well to combine.
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Turkey and Vegetable Soup
directions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onion, carrots, and celery. Cook until softened.
Stir in diced tomatoes, turkey broth, shredded turkey, and spices.
Simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped parsley.
ingredients: Spices (such as thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper)

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
directions: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella cheese.
Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate, alternating.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil.
Season with salt, pepper, and fresh basil leaves.
Serve immediately as a refreshing appetizer.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
directions: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add sliced bell peppers, broccoli florets, and snap peas.
Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, or until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Season with soy sauce and sesame oil.
Serve hot over cooked rice.

recipes.title: Banana Oatmeal Pancakes
directions: In a blender, combine bananas, oats, milk, eggs, and cinnamon.
Blend until smooth.
Pour pancake batter onto a hot griddle or skillet.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve hot with maple syrup and sliced bananas.
ingredients: Maple syrup and sliced bananas for serving

recipes.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
directions: In a large bowl, combine cooked chickpeas, diced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, chopped red onion, and chopped parsley.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of dried oregano.
Toss gently to combine.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish or light meal.
ingredients: 2 cans (15 oz each) chickpeas, drained and rinsed
